main event: A military aircraft sighted an unidentified object resembling a fireball that appeared to be disintegrating during its descent.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 5-6 seconds., The object was first observed at an altitude of 15,333 feet., It appeared to have a flame with a short tail and was the size of a pea when spotted., The sighting was reported by three officers and two enlisted personnel., The object's course was descending southeast before it began to disintegrate.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object shaped like a fireball
witness description: three officers and two enlisted personnel
